LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays all files attached to a record with the ability to download all files as a single ZIP archive.

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: Title displayed in the component header

property.name: excludedFileExtensions
property.label: Excluded File Extensions
property.description: Comma-separated list of file extensions to exclude (e.g., docx,exe,pdf)

property.name: initialFilesDisplayed
property.label: Initial Files Displayed
property.description: Maximum number of files to display initially. Set to 0 or leave empty to show all files.
